author: Cedric Canard
content: I do like this image. I kept it on a tab of my browser for a long time when I first saw it on Flickr and would just look at it every now and then. There's a lot to like in it. It has me wondering what kind of rooms might be behind the curtains. If this is a private residence, it would be odd to have your windows right there, at street level, next to a tram stop. You'd never be able to open your curtains ðŸ™‚
